perturbation.original_text:
1.
Resale Rights. SFDC hereby appoints SUB-RESELLER (“Sub-Reseller”) as a sub-reseller to whom Reseller may resell
Services in accordance with Section 2(ii) of the Agreement, provided that Sub-Reseller may only resell such Services to
Customer. Reseller must ensure that Sub-Reseller complies with the terms of the Agreement applicable to Reseller as if Sub-
Reseller were an original party to the Agreement and any breach by Sub-Reseller of the Agreement will be deemed a breach
by Reseller. Sub-Reseller is not be a third-party beneficiary of the Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
4.
Counterparts. This Sub-Reseller Agreement may be executed in one or more counterparts, including facsimiles or scanned
copies sent via email or otherwise, each of which will be deemed to be a duplicate original, but all of which, taken together,
will be deemed to constitute a single instrument. Reseller must ensure that Sub-Reseller complies with some of the terms of the Agreement applicable to Reseller as if Sub-Reseller were an original party to the Agreement, however the Sub-Reseller will be considered an original party.
perturbation.explanation: The section on Sub-Reseller rights is moved from its own dedicated section into a section about counterparts. It also creates a contradiction by stating the Sub-Reseller is not and is to be considered an original party.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - Clear definition of rights and responsibilities

perturbation.original_text:
3.
Entire Agreement. The terms and conditions herein contained constitute the entire agreement between the Parties with
respect to the subject matter of this Sub-Reseller Agreement and supersede any previous and contemporaneous agreements
and understandings, whether oral or written, between the Parties hereto with respect to the subject matter hereof.
perturbation.changed_text:
3.
Entire Agreement. The terms and conditions herein contained constitute the entire agreement between the Parties with
respect to the subject matter of this Sub-Reseller Agreement and supersede any previous and contemporaneous agreements
and understandings, whether oral or written, between the Parties hereto with respect to the subject matter hereof unless there is an agreement otherwise.
perturbation.explanation: The added clause 'unless there is an agreement otherwise' directly contradicts the 'entire agreement' clause. The original clause states that the written agreement is the final say but this added section states this is only true if another agreement does not exist, leading to a lack of legal clarity.
